scripts.reset: npx knex migrate:rollback --all && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.spinup2: docker exec -it cruddb psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE cruddb;"
scripts.spinup3: npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.backendspinup: npm run spinup1 && sleep 10 && npm run spinup2 && sleep 10 && npm run spinup3 && npm start
scripts.dockerreset: docker exec -it cruddb psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE cruddb;"
